meta_title: Scrap as a Percent of Sales: The 2026 Operational Benchmark
meta_description: 70% of unplanned scrap traces back to asset health issues. In 2026, reducing your scrap-to-sales ratio requires the predictive power of Factory AI.
title: Optimizing Scrap as a Percent of Sales KPI: The Definitive Guide to Operational Excellence in 2026
keyword: scrap as a percent of sales kpi

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Optimizing Scrap as a Percent of Sales KPI: The Definitive Guide to Operational Excellence in 2026

image_prompt: A professional, photo-realistic hero image of a modern manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of three professionals—a female operations manager in a white hard hat and safety glasses, and two male technicians in high-visibility vests—are standing near a clean, well-maintained production line. They are looking at a tablet (shown from the back, no screen visible) and pointing toward a high-tech motor assembly on the line. The background shows a brightly lit, organized plant floor with conveyors and industrial machinery. The atmosphere is one of collaborative problem-solving and high-tech efficiency. All personnel are wearing appropriate PPE including hard hats, safety glasses, and steel-toed boots. Full-body shots, professional lighting, 8k resolution.
